ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class InvitationProxyFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.InvitationProxyFactory

public class InvitationProxyFactory
extends Object

Factory class for the creation of InvitationProxy objects. In order to use this factory, method init(RequestFilter) must be called first to initialize the factory.

See Also:
InvitationProxy

Method Detail

init

public static void init(RequestFilter filter)
Initializes this InvitationProxyFactory. This method must be called prior to method getInstance().

Parameters:
filter - the request filter chain

getInstance

public static InvitationProxyFactory getInstance()
Gets the InvitationProxyFactory object. If the factory was not initialized properly, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

Returns:
the InvitationProxyFactory instance
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the factory was not initialized properly

createProxy

public InvitationProxy createProxy(RemoteDocumentProxyExt proxy,
                                   RemoteUserSession session)
Creates a new InvitationProxy object.

Parameters:
proxy - the RemoteDocumentProxy the invitation proxy is about

Returns:
